“According to CAGR, 2021 to 2025 of 6.7%, Shopify projected market volume surpasses $1.6 billion in 2025.”

What Is Shopify?

Shopify is a cloud-based shopping cart solution, working as SaaS, which enables businesses across industries and sets up online stores, sells products quickly and effectively. It is gaining popularity and listed amongst the top 10 Shopify development companies in 2020-2021.

In today’s time, maintaining social distancing is a platform, giving Shopify development a noticeable boost. The most remarkable thing about Shopify website development company is that it should provide top-notch service at affordable rates.

Yeah, it’s’ all about the appeal and attraction; that’s how Shopify development agency gives you numerous pricing plans with extensive features that fit in well with businesses of all sizes across industries.

Shopify excites everyone and bemuses all. You are a startup or a large enterprise; everyone can benefit from using the Shopify eCommerce platform and offering several integrations to upscale the software and business fortunes.

In the year 2021, businesses across the world are recuperating, and eCommerce is no exception either. Many companies are roping into Shopify to sell their products. The most popular and exciting businesses include — The Candi Factory, Wolf Circus, Watch Outfitter, Zero Gravity, and Novo.

So many of us ask why all these upcoming brands and businesses on Shopify are? To answer this, let me strike out a couple of Shopify advantages.

Easy To Use: The most appealing and the biggest reason is that merchant users love Shopify. Anyone across the country can use it without being confused. They don’t need a developer to add items to the site or add filters.

Simple: Creating discount coupons, adding discounts, and processing orders using Shopify is quite uncomplicated and straightforward. This platform gives you a user-friendly design with a drag & drop editing tool.

Low Startup Cost: Shopify is quite affordable since it is available at a low and reasonable monthly fee. One can experience a Shopify plan which varies between $29 to $79 and is inexpensive, isn’t it?

Elegant Themes: Shopify provides an extensive range of user-friendly, smart, and mobile responsive themes for the merchants to choose from. If you are looking for more options, Shopify offers premium (paid) themes.

Apt For Drop-shipping: Drop shippers like Shopify. They can easily integrate with Oberoi and Spocket, which makes drop shipping easy.

Plenty of Support Options:  Accessibility to tech support and round-the-clock availability with services like chat, phone, and email.
